list.desc: Release of 2.0.0 with simplification changes implemented
list.descmd: This release of kl-gateway-rehab takes into account the simplification of FSIII. Specifically the ValueSets of valid condition codes have been updated. A close to real-life example has been added to the implementation guide. Updated dk-core dependency to 3.2.0, and kl-term dependency to 2.1.0

Version 1.0.0 of KLs ยง140 IG.

Initial release of ยง140 reporting IG

title: KLGatewayRehab
introduction: This IG includes models for reporting rehabilitation data from Danish Municipalities for secondary purposes.
